data.description: This playbook proactively blocks high impact indicators ingested from PhishMe. It was constructed for the Phantom Tech Session held on 04/07/2017 with PhishMe.

advanced.note: Pass artifacts where destinationDnsDomain is present.
Filter on artifacts with a severity of high.
Pass artifacts where requestURL is present.
Check if total positives of reputation lookup exceed threshold.
Select artifacts that have fileHashMd5 present.
Pull the threat report from PhishMe for inclusion in the ticket.

data.template: {{"work_notes": "The following source IPs connected with dst: {0}\n\nsrc: {1}"}}
{{"work_notes": "The malicious filehash {0} was found on the following hosts:\n{1}"}}

advanced.note: Pass artifacts where destinationAddress is present.

data.notes:
The following Apps are used in this playbook: 
 - PhishMe
 - Service Now
 - OpenDNS
 - VirusTotal
 - Carbon Black
 - Palo Alto Networks Firewall
